ValidationRule.description: Require Agency Trade License Number for Buyer when Inquiry Type is 'Agency'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW() , IF( ISPICKVAL( os_Winning_Inquiry__r.os_InquiryType__c , 'Agency'), ISBLANK( os_Buyer_Tenant__r.os_Agency_Trade_License_No__c ) , null ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the 'Agency Trade License Number' for the Buyer when the Inquiry Type is set to 'Agency'.
